website_summaries.verdict: A rugged option that has several features to cut down on your power usage.
pros: Features three power modes, including an eco mode to save on electricity
Has a programmable thermostat and a timer
cons: Not as powerful as other heaters
Loud beep when pushing buttons cannot be disabled

customer_reviews.title: A must have heater!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super high quality product. Quiet. Strong. Heated an 1100 square foot area in no time. A Big Bang for the buck. Get this heater. You won't regret it. Awesome craftsmanship and value.
customer_reviews.author: T. King

customer_reviews.title: Ready for winter.....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this portal heater and really really like it. It's small, light weight and definitely blows the heat out. When it arrived, the box said Air Choice, not Trustech which was confusing to me. Bottom line...it's the same heater sold by Trustech (called Amazon to confirm). It has a programmable shut off, tip over shut off and the outlet plug did not get hot after running for an hour. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase :) PS...I included several pics!
customer_reviews.author: Spin Queen

customer_reviews.title: Odd smell and never shuts off?
customer_reviews.text: This heater has great reviews, which makes me thing I might have gotten something wrong with the unit? Came with making a rattle in the unit when moved, and now it's been a few days and there's still a strange plastic-like smell that's coming from the unit. Also, despite being set to a low temp, the heater doesn't seem to shut off when it reaches the right temp.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Goes up to 86°
customer_reviews.text: It warms up a large room very well. Have to set it to low at night or else it's too hot. It doesn't make any clicking noises to wake you up at night. I like it. The outside doesn't get too hot
customer_reviews.author: Mary Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: i bought this as a gift to my son and it works well. Heates up the area quite nicely. glad that we bought it for him
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: As expected a very reliable ceramic heater, and lighteight
customer_reviews.text: It is rare to find a product that really matches the description (features). This ceramic heater is light weight and the remote works just as expected. You practically do not need to read the instructions. After plugging in, I attempted to move the heater while it was turned on and the unit auto shut off. With kids or pets this is a great safety feature to have. Heats up around 1000 sq. ft. in 15-20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: The WHO

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but....
customer_reviews.text: It needs a Quick start Menu - there is a rear override switch that needs to be turned ON before the POWER ON switch will operate the unit. Also needs a DO NOT PICKUP AND TILT when starting up - it turns off automatically. Both of these are great features - we just need to know it before starting uo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save's on my Electric Bill
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been a very good heater. I put it in my sunroom where I don't have any heat, I now can use the sunroom all year long, I plan on buying another heater for my screened in porch that I put up clear plastic and keep heated in very cold weather. The outside cat uses it to stay out of the cold. Ron Walker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and doesn't take a lot of space
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a nice digital display that I can read from across the room so I can use the remote easily. There are two indents on the sides which make it easy to pick up to move from room to room as needed. It is very stable so I'm not worried about it accidentally tipping over. The cord is heavy duty and does not get warm at all even after running for several hours. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KarenWho

customer_reviews.title: Feel the heat!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t wait to open our new space heater it’s 25 degrees out and dropping. Plugged it in turned it on and couldn’t believe the heat! Wow! Purchased for use in my RV. Well made, easy to use and exceeded my expectation. Love the remote and program flexibility. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Roy T Jones

customer_reviews.title: Broke 2 seconds after I powered it on!!!
customer_reviews.text: Turned on the heater and 2 seconds later a big part that i could see thru the vent broke and came lose in the housing. POS, stay away!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lugo-Vina

customer_reviews.title: The BEST heater for my elderly mother (and therefore, me!)
customer_reviews.text: We had tried several heaters but this one fits the bill. Because it will heat the room up very quickly; to a high heat level; using a remote so I can do it from the doorway. It has a timer so we can set it and forget it. It is fixed to where if she accidentally knocks it over it will not work so we don't have to worry so much about fires. And it puts out the amount of heat that she likes--akin to the surface of the sun (LOL). Anyway, what makes her happy makes us happy. We really and truly like it and we will keep using it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Buyer's remorse
customer_reviews.text: After much research, ordered this product, and found not suitable for me. The low wattage is 1000 watts not 700 watts. The eco setting will cycle on and off but the "comfort temp" of 68 is factory set-can't be changed. So if you find 68 is cold for you (like me) you will freeze until the unit turns on and freeze when the unit turns off. Also no batteries come with the remote. How much more expensive to add 2 AAA batteries to the packaging?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best space heater we've owned out of many.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully redesigned variation on the genre of space heaters. There are many improvements: smaller, lighter, yet powerful; thermostat works much better because the coils shut off three minutes before checking temperature; nice remote with quiet sounds instead of loud beeps, etc. The only criticism is that the 'Eco' mode is useless and not adequately explained.
customer_reviews.author: NCBreeze

customer_reviews.title: A SPACE HEATER THAT REALLY "HEATS"!
customer_reviews.text: We have a large house and keep space heaters in nearly every room (12) of the house during winter. We've always used other brands, so this was the first time in trying out the Trustech 1500W. Guess what? It's by far the best. Good constant heat. Excellent flow and dispersal pattern. Fires up in an instant. Try it out. You'll be happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Works Great. Bought two of them based on Amazon customer reviews.
customer_reviews.text: E-Z remote lets you choose between three modes of heat. The unit works quietly and does not blow the circuits in my 1910 house the way other, older models of heaters used to. Compact, light weight and easy to move and it puts out a lot of heat when required. These inexpensive heaters saved me a lot of money when our old gas floor furnace gave up the ghost. Heating contractors want more than $1400 to fix my ancient floor heater and now I don't have to!
customer_reviews.author: M. Forer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good! A solid little heater.
customer_reviews.text: We have a room in our basement that we use as a gym that gets cold in the winter. While I don't want it super warm, 55F is a bit chilly. I use the heater to keep the room at a nice 63-65F. I have only had it for a few days, but it seems to be doing the trick. The only feature that I would find super useful would be a programmable thermostat that works off of a clock. The countdown clock would work fine, but only if I am in the gym to reset it.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN W.

customer_reviews.title: Heats well, loud beep
customer_reviews.text: Heats well and quickly. My wife's a teacher, I bought this specifically for her to heat the bathroom since she gets up early. I bought this model because it has a timer so she can set it to turn on before she gets up. Only thing is that it beeps loudly when it comes on, which wakes her up, even though the bathroom door (which attaches to our bedroom) is closed. I wish there was a way to turn off the beeper. That's the only thing keeping me from giving five stars. And her solution has been to set it to come on even earlier so she's in a deeper sleep, that has worked so far.
customer_reviews.author: cars777

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HEATER
customer_reviews.text: This is a great heater for the money. Easy to use, lightweight and has a relatively long cord. Works well in our office.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Jones Craft

customer_reviews.title: For Personal heating only
customer_reviews.text: This works well for personal heating but not for room heating, not even for a small room. I tried it in my bedroom and had to leave it on in high heat mode for the entire night to barely keep the room warm. I think Infrared heaters are meant for personal heating. Tried couple of ceramic heaters which did much better job than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Crusader87

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time, get something else
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this heater... but my other one kicks this ones butt. A half hour running in my office and the room is barely warmer than the house. My other space heater turns the room into a sauna. Sadly I’m stuck with this one as my wife uses the good one. Ive run it for longer periods as well and my office never reaches the shut off temp and only gets the room to feel barely comfortable. Remote does not come with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: JMelt

customer_reviews.title: Not what you think
customer_reviews.text: I read most of the reviews claiming this heater is the best thing. Well I certainly wasn't impressed. Ran this thing for over an hour on high in my living room about 400 sq ft. Temperature only increased 2 degrees. Might be great for a small room that's it. Don't go thinking this heater will make big difference in a big room that's constantly cold or heat your garage .
customer_reviews.author: A F B

customer_reviews.title: Great heater at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Cincinnati has had a mild winter so far, but this heater definitely takes the chill out of the room. Small enough to be out of the way, yet big enough to heat a large bedroom is just what I wanted. The remote makes a huge difference by being so convenient to operate. I would suggest this unit to anyone needing a room heater. When I asked out handyman for suggestions, he first mentioned the importance of auto shut off in case it was knocked over. All the bells and whistles without the bill$!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a space heater, seriously look no further. I have a basement in a 1950 house that is probably around 300 square foot. Prior to the heater it was freezing down there and nothing we did kept it warm. I bought this one because it had a remote and a timer setting. I am extremely impressed with this heater, we keep it at 68 on the economy setting and run it probably 8-12 hours a day. The basement is nice and warm and I haven't noticed too much of an influx on my electric bill because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Timer-power-off/power-on feature adds value.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and well performing compact heater. On winter evenings, we spend time in just a few rooms upstairs. There are three approximately 12 x 14 rooms connected by a hallway and the unit warms them all. We wanted to warm that area without consuming all the energy required by the forced air units for the entire level. The unit meets that requirement. The timer-power-on feature is very good for pre-warming the area prior to rising from slumber without having to run the unit all night. We will know more when we get the utility bill for this period of time, but our instinct is that this is a more efficient solution.
customer_reviews.author: Tom V.

customer_reviews.title: Loud cracking noise
customer_reviews.text: This heater is so loud with its noises from heating I read in the reviews from someone that it doesn’t make the cracking noises but it does and when you turn it on the buttons are so loud it works great but I can’t stand hearing the cracking noise while I try and sleep at night
customer_reviews.author: Vincent whitley

customer_reviews.title: Functional. Works. Not the best manual or the looks
customer_reviews.text: It works. Tried switching between several modes. While the differences between High and Low was obvious, Eco mode was confusing and it did not allow selecting temperature with remote. Manual has little info about it. After the shutoff, it takes about 2 mins to turn off the fan. It is light. Looks and feels cheap though (we have several box heaters to compare it to), but no issues with its functionality. Two AAA batteries for remote are NOT included.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Svecs

customer_reviews.title: Very good heater all around
customer_reviews.text: I found this heater to exceed my expectations in quality as well as performance. I really like the way it will have a warm room when you wake up or stay on for a certain number of hours. It seems to do a really good job in a fairly decent size room also. I absolutely love it. Then a remote to boot...wow!
customer_reviews.author: amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: Greatly dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Received the product last week. Love the design, light weight, quiet blower; timer and remote are nice features to have. Then comes my major disappointment... The thermostat doesn't work as advertised (see the web about "INTELLIGENT PROGRAMMABLE THERMOSTAT"), it's not cycling the unit on and off to maintain the desired temperature in the room, it just keeps going no matter what the setting is. The unit produces some smell, like burned plastic. It's not overwhelming, but it still does not go away after using the product for five days in a row. That brings up health hazard concerns, especially if using in a bedroom. Definitely not the product I was expecting and paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exellent Space Heater with many features,
customer_reviews.text: The Trusttech Space heater arrived right on time and was well packaged. After reading the instuctions I set in up in my living room and my wife commmented shortly thereafter that she felt the heat even though she as quite a distance from the heater. It ran quieter then expect and using the remote was easy as was programing the thermostat. The eco mode work just as I hoped and cycled off when the temp was reached and back on again. I am planning to use in my Motorhome while we sleep as it is quieter then the furnance and heatpump.
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater, Heats up FAST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this out of the box and my bedroom is a standard 12x12 and heats up with in less then 5 mins when I put it on high and then about 10 mins keep it on low. I like eco friendly option to minimize usage and save electricity costs. Overall great product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sunil suku

customer_reviews.title: A great little space heater
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a similar model that stopped working properly. I am actually glad the other one broke because this one is so much better. It worked right out of the box (no real setup required), with easy to use controls. We use it to maintain the comfort level in a large basement space, which it does quite well on ECO mode with outdoor temps in the 30s.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Did not perform well !!
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful this would help keep my tiny room warm,, did not even make a dent in my 12 x 12 foot bedroom. Worse, every time I change channels on my TV, the heater would turn on then off, on the off, on the off,, so annoying !!! I researched this and the reviews looked promising,, unfortunately it was a let down. Fortunately it was a Prime purchase and will I be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma Adriana

customer_reviews.title: BIG flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Great heater with one BIG flaw. The heater temperature will increase when my Roku remote is used to decrease the volume on my TV. Now with a new Vizio sound bar and remote, the unit turns on and off when the volume is adjusted up or down. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: JJinOK

customer_reviews.title: It broke in one month ...
customer_reviews.text: We just got it last month, the first couple week we love it , it was easy to control from tem to time. But this week I realize it’s not as hot as used to , even I turn it on for 3 hours, it barely heat up the whole room, And the timer broke!!!! This is the biggest reason we purchase this... Can’t believe we only use a month >< ( the average hour we use every day was last then 3 hours, so def not Bcs we use the wrong way ) one week after returning date, what should we do???
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K. McArdle

customer_reviews.title: Enough for snowman to melt in seconds
customer_reviews.text: We have a full basement there is only one air vent in this big room - I decided to order this product to heat up the room and good enough it worked like wonders!! Love it. It comes with the remove and thermostat adjustment programmable exactly at 69 all the way if it's too warm it will turn off automatically what a great way to save the $$ on heat bill - what's more I have 3 story house and the heat reached up to 3rd floor it was awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Mulan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Heater! Definitely Worth the Price! (Which isn’t that bad of a price)
customer_reviews.text: I live in a basement apartment and it can get cold and the heating system doesn’t work that well. I decided to get a new heater after my old one has become a disappointment and it is so nice! I could feel the cold break the first minute it was on. The remote control is super nice as I don’t have to get up from the couch or bed to shut it off. It’s pretth quite obviously there will be some noise but nothing too over powering and I forget It’s on after a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Just moved into a new house and our basement doesn't have heat. We use it for storage but in the bitter cold of upstate New York, it's difficult to get things organized. Purchased this heater and could not be happier. Ended up having to go down to shorts because of how comfortable the temperature was in the room. I have not had problems with the remote like others have in the reviews. Put in the batteries (Triple A not included) and it worked right away, after I found the switch at the back haha. Hope everyone enjoys it like I have!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lunstead

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Heater!
customer_reviews.text: We heat our spaces with a fireplace insert, so our bedroom is always cold in the winter. I've gone through several cheaper heaters that last for one season (if we're lucky) and didn't want to go that route again. The Trustech Portable Space Heater has performed perfectly! Easy to use, robust without excess weight, and warms the room quickly, even in energy saving mode. Great features and well worth the price! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Tate

customer_reviews.title: Warm but buttons are loud
customer_reviews.text: This thing cranks our heat. We have had many other space heaters and none are remotely as hot as this one. No major increase to utility bill compares to other siacevheaters either. Only drawback is the buttons make a very loud beep, which can be heard throughout our house. Can be very disruptive when you turn it off before bed and the rest of your house is asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Troy S.

customer_reviews.title: Ah, Portable Warmth
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to heat me where I'm at in the house, and not try and warm the whole house. So it needed to be light, and easy to handle. This is the perfect solution. It's light enough to be easily carried in one arm, and it's got nice hand holds on the sides to make it easy to pick up. It's got a decently long cable to make positioning it easy, and the remote control is just wonderful. There's no need for an intense training session...just plug it in and turn it on, although it does have more capabilities, such as a timer. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: David C Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This heater works well. I purchased it for a large room that has a wood burning fireplace as the only source of heat. On days when there is no wood to burn, this heater warms the entire room quickly. It's light and portable and not too noisy. I wasn't bothered by the sound at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great heat output but low fan could be quieter
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a room heater for my office. This heater works well and keeps the room quite warm even set at a low temperature. My only "wish" is for the low fan setting to be quieter. There doesn't really appear to be any difference in sound from high to low.
customer_reviews.author: kmn

customer_reviews.title: The heat from this heater goes up.
customer_reviews.text: I use this item in my garage and when I closed the panel in the ceiling, the heater uniformly heats the whole garage and no cold air comes down from the attic.
customer_reviews.author: Darnell Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Heater!
customer_reviews.text: We recently had an office constructed in our basement for my husband. Naturally, the basement is cold, and after reading all of the positive reviews on this heater, I decided to purchase it to help heat the office. My husband is extremely pleased with it. It is very easy to operate and does a wonderful job of keeping the office warm and cozy. We would definitely recommend it, and would purchase it again in the future. Buy this . . . you will be very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud and not very warm
customer_reviews.text: Item is very light wait and easy to use, but, compared to other products in the market, the heating is not very quick and not as warm either. The fan also keeps running whether the heating rods are on or not, which is a huge downside because the fans are extremely loud.
customer_reviews.author: Back

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Heater was exactly as I expected. Works great to maintain room temperature by individual degrees and very easy to use. Compact so it can fit easier in places, it's very light weight, and quiet. So far, we are loving it for our son's nursery, but also would work great at work.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Heats Large Rooms Well
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a space heater that was easy to use and would heat a large room. I finished the basement to use as an extra bedroom, but it tends to get very cold down there in the winter and we live in the Northeast. This heater does the job and is easy to use with the remote control and timer.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I bought it for my garage and it definitely heats up my 2 car garage I set it at 71 and it stays warm. Not sure if it’s energy efficient but we will see when the bill comes. Very easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Unit had been openned and possibly used
customer_reviews.text: First I noticed the box had already been opened and was torn inside. There was a loud rattle when I took the unit out of the box. The remote was repackaged in a used plastic bag. This was obviously a used item so I sent it back. The heater specs, however. look good. I was afraid to plug it in due to the internal rattle.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great heater with great features.
customer_reviews.text: This heater cranks out some heat. I use it for my bedroom instead of turning on the central heat. It gets the job done and isn't too loud
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Garage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for a Christmas gift and he used it during the winter months. Now, we live near Raleigh, NC so not sub-zero, but it did get to the 30s a lot this year. It worked perfectly for that.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Warms my whole workshop
customer_reviews.text: Three mode settings, high, low, eco. Effective fan to move heat into the room. Quickly warms the space.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri J. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome heater!
customer_reviews.text: I have a garage that I turn into a man cave. It is roughly 650 sq ft and this heater works good. I sit it on top of my subwoofer and put it on and warms the garage quickly. Good price and works good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works great have zero complaints about this product would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I love this heater. If you set the timer it will turn itself off when your time runs out. No problems with it as some other reviews have said. Try it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: whatsup

customer_reviews.title: Heats quick and not too loud
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate and program. Warms up quickly and heats entire room effectively. Not very loud so it does not interupt sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Product received is Infrared, not Ceramic as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Product received was "Infrared" not "Ceramic" as advertised in the product description! This is disappointing as I wanted Ceramic! Otherwise it is a quiet unit and works as advertised...but will be substantially more fragile due to the infrared glass tubes. At least, the seller has changed the improper ad...though too late for us, and we will have to wait and see if the infrared tubes have any longevity.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing heater
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this purchase. In LA it does not get cold very often but last few weeks was freezing. This heater kept us very warm and comfy in a 650 sq.ft apartment. Just buy the thing !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Naseem Khan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just received this heater setup easy puts out substantial heat for such a small unit. Only had it less than one day so can't give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: LAD

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and ease of setup
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight and size of the unit. I bought it for my travel trailer so the size and wight are important. Stows nicely in the space available.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Marceau

customer_reviews.title: Very safe to use it has auto shut off if tipped over
customer_reviews.text: This heater is light weight and small, east to move around and put out the amount of heat we were looking for
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: The Order arrived on time and in good condition. The set-up and operation instructions were easy to follow. I like the heater. It solves the heating issue I was having in my Woodworking Shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s not very big but it does throw out a lot of heat.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little heater. Keeps the room at a consistent temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: First one i recieved didn't work so this company replaced the item. The new one works much better ty .
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Works very good.
customer_reviews.text: This heater warms up a room really quick. It keeps the room nice and cozy. I love the different settings and how you can turn the digital thermostat up and down as you like.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Henry

customer_reviews.title: Mmm, warm
customer_reviews.text: Works well for a small space - fairly quiet, ability to program on and off, although just "start in X hours" or "turn off in X hours". Remote works well but is IR (infrared) instead of RF (radio frequency) so it needs line of sight. Very sturdy construction - seems robust and well made. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C Kirklin

customer_reviews.title: Really Puts Out the HEAT!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about bang for your buck! Read all the reviews re: how powerful this small heater is and thought...yeah, right. Surprise! It really delivered! Love the auto and safety features, as well. Can't go wrong on this buy. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie_Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Small and compact yet warms a large area quickly! Super easy to use. Doesn’t require any work to put together. Love the automatic features as well! I have this in my garage so it warms the garage in the morning for when I go out there to workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Compared to some of the other space heaters I have tried, this product turned out to be inferior. The remote came without the batteries, and it broke within days.
customer_reviews.author: Krsna

customer_reviews.title: Buy this heater. There. Search over!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT heater. It will heat a studio apartment with ease. Not loud, super easy to use. Nothing else needs to be said.
customer_reviews.author: Prison Mike

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It functions as advertised. The timer feature works well. Keeps my 24' x 12' office warm. Remote works well.
customer_reviews.author: rcecarbldr

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to use and produces efficient heat even in a large room
customer_reviews.text: The space heater is light weight so can be moved around. Puts out enough heat to keep the rest of the house comfortable and my bedroom cool also keeps my thermostat from kicking on so much so my heat isn’t as high.
customer_reviews.author: ldreed

customer_reviews.title: Space heater
customer_reviews.text: Started using immediately and it works great,very easy to use and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Walker

customer_reviews.title: It is safe indoors
customer_reviews.text: It does ok. It won't tip over. Kids won't get burned. I like the timer
customer_reviews.author: Lou Christo

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this in Dec 2018. On March 9, 2019, it's dead, I use space heater to keep my computer den, warm, only used it when I was in room, turn it off every night. This morning, try to turn it on, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Compact
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying the room I use this for is kinda small but it does do the job, I can slip it in a corner and let it work it's magic, plus the convenience of the remote control, so you never have to leave your bunkered in position to heat up the room of even turn it on. It's so good I bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton M.

customer_reviews.title: Efficient heater with time delay power on option
customer_reviews.text: Heater really heats an area well. Produces much more heat than the previous space heater I had. Especially like the delayed power on option. Can set the heater to turn on automatically in 1-12 hours. Nice to get the space warmed up aytomatically before you wake up
customer_reviews.author: Foodlover10

customer_reviews.title: This thing is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Lake Havasu City Arizona where it gets bitter cold in the winter, down to 45 degrees at night! In the summer our day temp is 118. We have a 50 foot RV garage coupled with a 2 car garage and this little fellow keeps it almost to 70 all the time, in December. I have run this for a week now. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome programming feature
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love that you can program it and it will turn off when it hits that temperature and on again if it gets too cold. We use it in my daughters bedroom so she doesn't overheat like the old space heater made her.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t lase
customer_reviews.text: My remote stopped working after 3 months...heater after 8. It was great while it lasted. I never moved the heater from original location and never left it on for long. Pretty disappointed especially for the price. I’m hoping they will send me a replacement and if they do I’ll update this
customer_reviews.author: Anathea A.

customer_reviews.title: Lowering my electric bill.
customer_reviews.text: At night we turn our house heater low and use the Trustech Electric Space Heater in our bedroom. We can change the degree without getting out of bed and wake up to a comfortable temperature. We use the Portable Space Heater for our morning get-ready-for-work route. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Great workshop heater
customer_reviews.text: The automatic shutoff timer is very useful. The heating elements put out a lot of heat. It works well in my unheated workshop.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater.
customer_reviews.text: Makes a room toasty. Two things to note: 1. This heater is low to the floor so it creates a hot spot on tile flooring when set to high. 2. There is a power switch in the back that has to be turned on before the heater will work. (Should be in start up instructions NOT maintenance.)
customer_reviews.author: Darla May

customer_reviews.title: It important to know all the information about and how to use it
customer_reviews.text: When I received it, I open immediately and set it up. It was easy. I was amazed at how fast it warmed up my living room. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Hunte

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and super cozy
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and powerful. Need to take the time to learn the remote and settings. But totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Maya B

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We have a family room that needs a little extra help heating up on cold days. Our old space heater kicked the bucket. We were looking for a safer unit. Our prior heater was tall and clumsy. This generates great heat and we like the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley B. Wrightsel

customer_reviews.title: Solid Heater.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent space heater. What I like about it is the temp control function which turns off automatically at the temp you set. A bit difficult at first to get used to the controls. The room heats up fast once set.
customer_reviews.author: Amolio

customer_reviews.title: I would like to have my free Surge Protector Strip .
customer_reviews.text: It is noisy , but it’s easy to operate and woks well .
customer_reviews.author: Emmy Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Little but mighty
customer_reviews.text: We bought this portable heater and to help supplement are propane usage. Last month was very cold and it cut our cost by a 1/3. We are very happy and we will be using it for years to come. It’s small enough to put away when not using.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sammacicci

customer_reviews.title: This is a great heater
customer_reviews.text: For the price the quality and the ease of use it wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: When I turn it on it works, every time.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the fan blower stayed on a little bit to long (3+ minutes) after the heater shuts off. Heats up quick and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Home in IndianaAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Cozy creator
customer_reviews.text: This thing can warm up a pretty nice sized room! Warm and cozy this thing is!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Aultman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This heater works wonderful! I have a large studio space with large ceilings and it heats up the place in no time! It’s small and compact which is perfect for storing when the cold season is over. Excellent purchase very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: mark gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: It blew up the 1st time we turned it on. I read all instructions before operating so we returned it. We were very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Nannie

customer_reviews.title: Great little Heater
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my home office. Nice and compact and warms very quickly. Ha several safety features so I am not worried while using it. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Great compact heater!
customer_reviews.text: After trying several other small infared heaters, I finally found the one that delivers. Compact, lightweight, nice long cord, and delivers strong spot heat as well as full room heat. Great price. Highly recommend this heater!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Reed

customer_reviews.title: It's cheaper, no warranty,
customer_reviews.text: After two months of use , start to make a lot of noise and shaking, don't buy it, you can not return it
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Castilla

customer_reviews.title: Little Heater that is PACKING HEAT!
customer_reviews.text: Wow...this little thing is heating up my entire living room. I love how lightweight it is and doesn't take up a lot of space. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rezilient1920

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: Works great to take the chill off the TV room
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Streight

product_meta.title: Electric Heater - Space Heater Radiant Heater, 1500W Infrared Heater with 3 Modes, Energy Saving Indoor Heater with Timer Setting, Ceramic Heater with Remote Control, Tip-Over & Overheat Protection
feature_bullets: ☀【INSTANT HEAT & Energy Saving】- No need to preheat. Turn on this space heater for home, it will heat up instantly and drive the cold winter away. This electric heater for the home carries three power modes, which allows the heater to blow warm air flow at different speed. The room heater will work on 1500W/700W while in High/Low mode. The Eco mode will cyclically on and off to maintain the warmth. This flexibility would help you to reduce the electric bill during the winter.

☀【LED DISPLAY & REMOTE CONTROL】– This space heater for indoor use was equipped with a LED display screen and signal lights. You can see the working status of this infrared heater clearly from far away. More convenience would be delivered by the remote in the package. These features allow you to control the portable heater for the home while you are watching TV on the couch, no need to get up to control the space heater with thermostat.

☀【INTELLIGENT PROGRAMMABLE THERMOSTAT】 – Our indoor use space heater carries the programmable thermostat function. You can set a degree that makes you feel comfortable. Then the electric heater for the home will heat cyclically for maintaining the temperature you set. You can enjoy the comfort seamlessly and focus on the business you are doing with our adjustable thermostat ceramic heater, no need to worry about the cold weather with the infrared space heater!

☀【CONVENIENT TIMMER SETTING】– Our portable space heater for indoor use carries a convenient timer function, which can be adjusted from 0 to 12 hours, so you don’t need to worry about the waste of electricity. The timer is not only set a time for the space heater with timer to shut off, but also for the electric heater for the home large room to operate, which allows you to have a‘warmly’ welcome when you arrive at home every day!

☀【DOUBLE SECURITY PROTECTION】– The radiator heater for the home carries features to prevent safety issues. Since our heater indoor portable electric is portable and light, it may be kicked down easier. Thus, we aid a tip-over shutoff feature in case of these problems. This large space heater also equips an overheat shutoff to prevent fire disaster by the unusual temperature rise. These features reflect our desire to offer you a great winter!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars343 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Specific Uses For Product: Indoor use only, portable air heaer for your entire house
